about_the_game:
All Aboard for Destruction!

In Battle Train, you'll outfit your train with powerful upgrades, lay down tracks to your enemy’s base, and annihilate them with explosive payloads, natural disasters, and yes—family-friendly taunts. It’s a fast-paced, over-the-top deck-building and rail strategy game where no track is too twisted, and no engine is too explosive.

Join the Craziest Game Show Ever!

Welcome to Battle Train, the world’s most chaotic gameshow! Meet a colorful cast of eccentric hosts and rival conductors as you battle through the ranks of champions. Outwit, outbuild, and outblast your opponents on your quest to become the Supreme President Conductor!

Features: So Much Cool Stuff!

  • Face Off Against Unique Foes - Each opponent brings their own powerful cards and wild abilities to the table.

  • Customize Your Train - Outfit your engine with powerful upgrades and insane abilities that suit your playstyle.

  • Build Your Ultimate Deck - Choose from various functional and fantastical cards to crush your opponents and control the battlefield.

  • Special Events and Rewards - Win riches, prizes, and glory in various special events, each packed with surprises.

  • A Wild and Hilarious Story - Dive into an outrageous narrative from the creators of 3 out of 10, Tower of Guns, and Mothergunship.

Whether you’re launching natural disasters, hurling explosive trains, or delivering devastating taunts, Battle Train promises a ride like no other!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 [64-bit]
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Intel Core i5 or AMD FX
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Outthink, outbuild, outblast! Battle Train combines deck-building and tactical rail combat. Upgrade your train, lay tracks, and destroy your rivals with devastating locomotives. The rails are your battlefield—will you be the last train standing?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
